availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Barnet V. Brewer (Mercer County, Kentucky, miller)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, miller. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret B. Tewmey Brewer in Mercer County, Kentucky, in September 1836. Father of William Brewer, John W. Brewer, Wintersmith Brewer, Garrad C. Brewer, Ophelia Brewer, Elbridge Brewer, Margaret Brewer, and Thomas M. Brewer. Miller in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 138.
"Barney Vanbrike Brewer (1809-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial #55589047, accessed March 4, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/55589047.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, 1826-1836, Film #000191855.
